entry.title: Combined summary - [Bitcoin Advent Calendar] Vaults
entry.summary: In his latest blog post, Jeremy Rubin discusses the importance of building better cold storage for Bitcoin using Sapio. Rubin emphasizes the significance of self-custody and explains how users can enhance their experience by combining Sapio with CTV. The purpose of this post is to serve as a follow-up to his previous post on self-custody. Rubin acknowledges the overload of posts and apologizes to his readers while promising to return to their inbox the next day. For those who seek more information, they can visit https://rubin.io/bitcoin/2021/12/07/advent-10/. Overall, Rubin's expertise in Bitcoin serves as a valuable resource for individuals interested in enhancing their understanding of Bitcoin and its related technologies.
